text: Etot shariat - luchshiy put' k tomu, chtoby svideteli davali vernoye svidetel'stvo imenem Allakha, boyas', kak by ikh lozh' ne obnaruzhilas' i ikh by ne razoblachili, yesli nasledniki dadut klyatvu o lzhivosti ikh klyatv. Boytes' Allakha v svoikh klyatvakh i povinuytes' Yego zakonam! Poistine, shariat Allakha uchityvayet vashi interesy i pol'zu, ne narushayte yego, chtoby ne okazat'sya v chisle nepravednykh! Allakh ne vedot po pryamomu puti tekh, kto vyshel iz povinoveniya Yemu
